actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that unearned income of a child attributable to damages received on account of personal injuries or sickness of the child shall not be taxed at the marginal rate of such child's parents.

summary.text: Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions governing situations in which unearned income of a child under age 14 is taxed as if it were parental income. Excludes from income subject to the parental tax rate any earnings attributable to personal injury awards.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that unearned income of a child attributable to damages received on account of personal injuries or sickness of the child shall not be taxed at the marginal rate of such child's parents.
